==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|mit|bringen}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmɪtʰbʀɪŋn̩/}} * {{audio|de|De-mitbringen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|bringt mit|brachte mit|mitgebracht|past subjunctive=brächte mit}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[bring]] along, to [[bring]] with # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[take]] along, to [[take]] with ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|bring|brach|gebracht|h|||bräch|||mit}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Mitbringsel}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German irregular verbs]]
